title: FS: Lot of 53 Low Grade T212 Obak - Many Tough Cards, Types 1, 2, 3 *ALL SOLD*
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 53 Low Grade T212 Obak - Many Tough Cards, Types 1, 2, 3 *ALL SOLD*
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T212 Obak cards available for sale. All of these cards are obviously very low grade and most have had the borders completely trimmed off.  Still, quite a few are very difficult low population cards and tough to find in any condition.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards from list for easier viewing):

1909 (Type 1):

**ALL SOLD**

1910 (Type 2, 150 Series):

**ALL SOLD**

1910 (Type 2, 175 Series):

**ALL SOLD**

1911 (Type 3):

**ALL SOLD**

I'll take Fisher (Portland).
PM sent.
Ben

I would like to purchase the 1909 Obak Mundorff for $75. PM on its way.

David McD.
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Just to let you know Mundorff arrived safe and sound today. Am close to wrapping up a 1909 set. Thanks for the sale.
Final price drop on the remaining cards from this lot.  Thanks for looking!

I'll take,
"Lefty" Miller (Oakland Oaks - 1911 Type 3)
PM sent.
Ben
